radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal echogenicity of the liver, no focal hepatic lesions, moderate intrahepatic biliary dilatation (main hepatic duct about 5 mm), extrahepatic ducts dilated (mid common bile duct up to 1.4 cm), multiple gallstones in the gallbladder with moderate wall edema and thickening, normal pancreatic duct size (3 mm), mild right-sided hydronephrosis, significantly dilated urinary bladder.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The intra- and extra-hepatic biliary dilatation is new since ___. The gallbladder is only slightly distended, similar to ___.
